name: WYLivePlayerLite
summary: 基于IJKPlayer编译封装的直播播放器，支持RTMP/RTMPS/RTMPT/RTMPE/RTSP/HLS/HTTP(S)-FLV/KMP  等网络协议， 支持录屏功能, 支持arm64
description:
集成注意事项：
1.使用cocoapods官方源
source 'https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs.git'
pod 'WYLivePlayerLite'

2.指定 podspec 文件路径
source 'https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/git/CocoaPods/Specs.git'
pod 'WYLivePlayerLite', :podspec => 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Jacke-xu/WYBasisKit-swift/master/WYLivePlayerLite.podspec'
